attributes.action: Petition European Airports to make Water Fountains available airside
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the current restrictions on carrying liquids through airport security, it seems that some european airports are allowing their shops to charge exorbitant amounts for bottled water.
So long as water may not be carried in hand luggage, Eurpoean Airports should ensure that
A) Water Fountains are provided for public use
B) Bottled water is sold at reasonable prices - e.g. no more than local supermarket cost x 2 (to allow for a reasonable mark-up).
